000110000 # Load 16
010010001 # Subt 17
100001000 # Skipcond on ACC = 0
100100101 # Jump to 5
100101101 # Jump to 13
100000000 # Skipcond on ACC < 0
100101011 # Jump to 11
000110001 # Load 17
010010000 # Subt 16
001010001 # Store 17
100100000 # Jump to 0
001010000 # Store 16
100100000 # Jump to 0
000110000 # Load 16
011000000 # Output
011100000 # Halt
000001010 # A = 10
000011000 # B = 24
